product_name: NEMO Disco Sleeping Pad Pump - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The NEMO Disco(TM) pad pump makes short order of inflating your plush air-filled NEMO sleeping pad. A single strong breath blows up the outer frame of the pump, making it springy and ready for use; press down on the top of the pump with your foot to inflate your pad. Weighs only 2.2 oz. and can be rolled up with your pad or kept in its lemon-size stuff sack. NEMO Disco pad pump uses a tapering cylinder press-fit attachment to accommodate a large variety of NEMO sleeping pads (pad not included). Closeout.
short_description: The NEMO Disco(TM) pad pump makes short order of inflating your plush air-filled NEMO sleeping pad.
